Websites.name: Palouse Mindfulness
Websites.description: Provides body scans (both 20 and 30 minutes in duration) as well as additional guided meditations and a full mindfulness-based stress reduction course.

Websites.name: Dr Weil
Websites.description: Dr. Weil is a recognized expert in integrated medicine and has a number of helpful links.

Websites.name: WebMD
Websites.description: Offers information and tips to improve sleep.

Websites.name: Retrain Pain Foundation
Websites.description: Very interesting and informative site to gain more understanding of pain and treatment options.

Websites.name: National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke
Websites.description: NIH provided information about sleep and tips to improve sleep.

Websites.name: American Chronic Pain Association
Websites.description: The American Chronic Pain Association provides pain education and pain management resources.

Websites.name: US Pain Foundation
Websites.description: The U.S. Pain Foundation serves those living with chronic pain and their caregivers by providing education and resources.

Websites.name: Gratefulness
Websites.description: Positive approaches to dealing with adversity.

Websites.name: The Mighty
Websites.description: Online health community that strives to inform and connect people with a wide variety of health concerns.

Apps of interest.name: Headspace
Apps of interest.description: Free trial consists of 10 recordings of guided meditation.

Apps of interest.name: Calm
Apps of interest.description: Free app with guided meditation and breathing exercises; has an interesting sleep stories section.

Apps of interest.name: Breathe2Relax
Apps of interest.description: Free app with guided meditation and breathing exercises.

Apps of interest.name: iHeadache
Apps of interest.description: Having already existed in online form, the iHeadache mobile app debuted on the App Store in early 2016. Designed by a neurologist, the app also creates reports designed specifically to help a doctor identify headache triggers and effective treatment methods.

Apps of interest.name: Sleep Cycle
Apps of interest.description: Features a patented technology that can track and evaluate your sleep patterns using sound or vibration analysis. The app then uses the data to generate graphs and reports to help you visualize your sleep cycles. It can also wake you at the optimal time so you feel less groggy during the day.

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Meditation: Addressing Pain
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: A brief explanation of the impact of mindfulness on pain

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Mindfulness Animated in 3 minutes
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: A brief animation about how to meditate

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Breathing Meditation
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: A 5 minute mindfulness exercise from the UCLA Mindfulness Awareness Research Center

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Mindfulness Guided Meditation
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: A 5 minute guided meditation with Dr. Robert E. Dinenberg

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Guided 10-minute Meditation with Andy Puddicombe
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: A 10 minute guided meditation with Andy Puddicome from the Headspace app

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Mindfulness Meditation - Guided 10 Minutes
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: A 10 minute guided meditation with The Honest Guys

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: 10 Minute Mindfulness Meditation
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: A 10 minute meditation from The Daily Calm app

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Jon Kabat-Zinn mindfulness
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: Videos range from 10-40 minutes of guided meditations, body scans, etc.

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Stephen Cope
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: For deep relaxation, body scans, and focusing attention.

YouTube videos and searches of interest.name: Five Minute Mindfulness Meditation for Chronic Pain Management
YouTube videos and searches of interest.description: Guided meditation with photos of nature.
